name: Insane Polygon
description:
Insane Polygon is a hypnotic musical maze. It's simple yet not so easy. Move your Player in either clockwise or anti-clockwise direction to get escape from being trapped in polygon maze, but watch out your game will be over when collide with polygon pattern.
Insane Polygon is a rhythm based game and ramps up the difficulty gradually along with visual themes, effects and sound tracks. Play through three given shapes viz. Triangle, Hexagon and Square ranges from simple to challenging. You will get trapped in complex patterns but will rejoice when figure out the patterns and how to navigate the tricky polygon world.
Give it a try and Enjoy!
